website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX5230 Pro XGA 3LCD Projector provides good brightness, solid data image quality and usable video for classroom or conference room.

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! I've used it extensively for PowerPoint presentations I give at many locations. I always bring my own projector with me because this one is often much better than whatever is available where I'm presenting. It is so bright than I can deal with much more ambient light than with other projectors. It's very easy to set up and it's certainly easy to use. The colors are very good and the images quite sharp and clear. I carefully researched projectors, and this one has been perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It is great for projecting presentations on the wall for small gatherings ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this projector for about 2 years. It is great for projecting presentations on the wall for small gatherings and for 200 plus people in a large meeting room. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: NJ resident

customer_reviews.title: 3500 lumens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector. If you are looking for a bright sharp image this is it!
customer_reviews.author: vadim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my church. It is super easy to set up and use. I really like that there is no 'cool off' period before you shut it down. My only complaint is that there is no on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: hltoddd

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easily adjustable projector
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive unit. I teach classes in various room and light situations. The Epson projects a very bright clear image, even when there is considerable outside light. I appreciate its easy and intuitive buttons for adjusting the image so that it is square to the screen. The on and off times are much shorter than any other projector that I have experienced. I would highly recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Small, short throw, easy to use and bright.
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been an outstanding projector that meets all my needs, for Power Point and other presentations.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: i ordered 3 of these for the office, 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 3 of these for the office, 1 gave lamp errors after one use, another overheats and shuts down after an hour. I only have 1 functional one of these now. and it has only been a few months
customer_reviews.author: John Grove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brightness and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This is truly glorious. Excellent brightness and connectivity, great remote functionality, and all at an amazing low, low price (relatively).
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, it seems to be doing what I bought it for; informal presentations
customer_reviews.author: NHCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the International Learning Disability Conference in Chicago and it just MADE the presentation. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lendell W. Braud

customer_reviews.title: Best projector for business meetings or conferences
customer_reviews.text: Great projector worked perfectly with crisp bright vivid colors. Relatively portable size comes with its own carry bag which makes it the best choice for our team. Highly recommend this product for anyone who needs a versatile projector that is portable. We've used it for large conferences and smaller board meetings - excellent!
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Clear, Well-Designed
customer_reviews.text: The last time I purchased a projector was about four years ago, so I expected this model would be an improvement -- and indeed it was. I'm no professional, but I have been very happy with just how strong, bright, and clear the images from this projector are. And the colors really pop while remaining true, to my eyes anyway, to the original source material. Factoring in a quite well-designed carrying bag and very easy setup and this turns out to be an excellent unit.
customer_reviews.author: Theseus

customer_reviews.title: A projector you can use in brightly-lit rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice for a projector for presentations. It is not ideal resolution for watching movies because it’s not wide. I’ve used this projector multiple times since receiving it and it has always exceeded my expectations. It has a fast warm up. Even with Eco setting, which lowers the fan noise, the screen is very bright. The USB port connectivity option worked with both Mac and Windows. Overall, this is a great projector!
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for presentations!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for PowerPoint presentations in a group setting. It's bright and vivid. It can even be used for video in a pinch, but it does not do 1080p resolution. The projector's native resolution is 1024x768. That's a 4:3 resolution, so not even widescreen. The projector is light enough, and the included accessories make it pretty simple to carry with you and hook up where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: lore

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clear and sharp image quality projector
customer_reviews.text: What's included: *Projector *Remote (full function) *Carry/storage bag *HDMI-HDMI and USB-VGA cables The projector is easily set up; out of the box it is practically plug and play. The image is sharp and high quality, and alignment is easy. Even when the projector is set up at an angle, it is not difficult to get it to project a square image on the screen. It runs quietly and image adjustments are easy. It includes a way to attach it to a tripod on the base. The remote is easy to use and most functions can be controlled with it. This is my first digital projector - I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Auskan

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: Epson EX5230 is made for the large conference room and the greater audience. The images are crystal clear and are guaranteed to make any presenter exceptional, provided the presentation is also of good quality. The device is portable and not much heavy. Highly recommended for corporate and government institutions.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: I'm NO vine writer just a honest customer.
customer_reviews.text: I'm NOT vine writer, I actually paid for this projector from epson as a refurbished projector $414.99 just someone who after about a few weeks of research decided on getting this epson ex5230 the brightness (3500 lumens) is good I needed the brightness, but if your a movie goer then you might want to get the WXGA vs the XGA which I got, but as I said it's good enough for me, I am pleased here are some pictures (4:3, 16:9 and a freeze shot of Scarlett johanson, damn she's hot...oh yea, my projector comes with a 1 year warranty👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
